Nightlight/Baby::

Nightlight tried to transform one more time, she had to ttake her baby out 
there. Dificult she did and took her baby in her arms, The baby was crying 
out 'cause the sound of the battle was scaring her. Nighlight dificultly 
moved and came in Rodimus, she was exausted  but still she could remember 
one person more "Rodimus... Blackfang, we can't leave him here, he won't 
have chance to survive if things go wrong... Maximals neve left their 
comrades behind, love"

She dificulty could be sit, but she had to resist a while more
